item.description:
Just $5.75! Showtime is 5pm-so we'll gather at 4:45pm; meet for drinks or dinner after for those who wish...more meetup details below, but first... Synopsis: The crew of the Starship Enterprise returns home after an act of terrorism within its own organization destroys most of Starfleet and what it represents, leaving Earth in a state of crisis. With a personal score to settle, Capt. James T. Kirk (Chris Pine) leads his people (Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoë Saldana) on a mission to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction, thereby propelling all of them into an epic game of life and death.

Meet at Cinemark in Hampshire Mall at 4:45pm in front of the inside entrance to Arizona Pizzawhich is across from the Cinemark ticket counter (or try to find us inside the theatre if you miss us); we're watching the regular digital version so we get discount Tuesday price - just $5.75. After the movie, those who wish can join us for food or drink and discussion at Arizona Pizza (or elsewhere if people want to try something different).

Like us on Facebook:/filmgroup

 

If you are interested in sharing a ride, you can post ride offers or requests on the Rideshare page for our group: Ridebuzz.org/Meetup
item.name: Star Trek Into Darkness
